DOC.brief_summary: The objective clinical study medicinal product medical use : compare efficacy safety generic drug BCD-063 Copaxone®-Teva patient relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis . Period clinical study medicinal product medical use : June 10 , 2013 March 23 , 2016 . Number patient , involve study medicinal product medical use : 158 patient .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety BCD-063 Copaxone-Teva Patients With Relapsing-Remitting Multiple Sclerosis

Absence exacerbation 4 week prior inclusion ; Readiness patient ( gender ) use reliable method contraception ( least 1 barrier method combination : spermicide , intrauterine device/oral contraceptive ) Secondary progressive primary progressive form multiple sclerosis ; 2. increase transaminase ( ALT , AST ) gammaglutamyltransferase 2.5 time upper limit normal range ; Violation bone marrow function reduce total number leukocytes < 3000 /mcl , platelet count < 125000 /mcl , hemoglobin concentration reduction , < 100 g / l ;
